Class PasswordUtil

java.lang.Object
utils.PasswordUtil
public class PasswordUtil extends Object
This utility class provides methods for hashing passwords and verifying hashed passwords using the Argon2 hashing algorithm. It supports generating new hashes and verifying provided plaintext passwords against existing hashes.
Author:
Dhruv

  • Constructor Details

    • PasswordUtil

      public PasswordUtil()

  • Method Details

    • hashPassword

      public static String hashPassword(String plainPassword)
      Hashes a plaintext password using the Argon2id algorithm. A new salt is generated for each password.
      Parameters:
      plainPassword - The plaintext password to be hashed.
      Returns:
      The hashed password, formatted as "salt$hash" using Base64 encoding.

    • verifyPassword

      public static boolean verifyPassword(String hashed, String plain)
      Verifies if a plaintext password matches a previously hashed password. The hashed password must be in the format "salt$hash".
      Parameters:
      hashed - The stored hashed password.
      plain - The plaintext password to verify.
      Returns:
      true if the password matches; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the hashed password format is invalid.

    • generateSalt

      private byte[] generateSalt()
      Generates a random salt for hashing purposes.
      Returns:
      A newly generated salt as a byte array.
